body:
Currently you can save the state of only one duel which also has to be done manually using the "Save duel" option. Very limited and easy to forget.

Instead auto-save duel before and after game. Add "Resume duel" option to main menu to continue the last duel played. The "Load duel" option would let you select from the last X duels saved. The "Save duel" option then creates a permanent save if required.

Wishlist: currently you cannot save the state of a game but that should be the ultimate goal and would be another distinguishing feature of Magarena. The fact that there is already a mechanism in place for testing game scenarios gives me hope that this might be achievable.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Auto-save the last X duels played.
